text: Super Bowl XXXVII was the thirty-seventh Super Bowl to happen. It featured a match between the NFC Champions, the Tampa Bay Buccaneers and the AFC Champions, the Oakland Raiders. Tampa Bay won the game 48-21. The halftime show featured Shania Twain, No Doubt and Sting. ==References== *037 Category:2003 in sports Category:2003 in California Category:21st century in San Diego
title: Super Bowl XXXVII
